channel.title: #178: The Hungry Time, with Ed Freyfogle
channel.description:
<iframe height="200px" width="100%" frameborder="no" scrolling="no" seamless src="https://player.simplecast.com/20a20ef4-442d-4aa4-be55-1dbabd83332a?dark=false"></iframe>
Both Ed and Steve are feeling a little bit stressed, perhaps at the beginning of burnout. We discuss why this might be, and what we are doing about it.
**This episode is the end of the current season.**
A new mini-season starts next with an acting guest host stepping in for the next few weeks while I take a break. In this episode we reveal our who guest host will be.
Who is the guest host? A clue: I interviewed the guest host on a recent episode that is on [the Bootstrapped YouTube channel](https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCw2fdiY8JkDPbGaurnoh_1g).
